Posted By: David Goff
Up for sale is an authentic 1887 N172 Old Judge card of Philadelphia Athletics Mike Mattimore. Card has been graded and certified by SGC as a 40 VG. No creases. Strong card.

SOLD shipped w/DC 
I take PayPal, moneyorders, and checks. Email me with any questions
